attributes.action: Change the Charity Commissions 2 Signatories rule
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Require the charity commission to make changes to the accounting rules to bring it in line with the 21st century, with the growth of the Internet and retailers banning cheques means that we are restricted in how we can process our finances, furthermore the 2 signatories rule is flouted anyway with cheques being pre signed and members having to pay for good in advance because they need to use electronic payment, the risk is simply moved on. We need to have the facility for card payments
